name: Log Cabin Dizzy (ZX Spectrum Edition)
description:
ZX Spectrum remake of PC game "Log Cabin Dizzy" (by Jamie Douglas)
Game made with Dizzy Scripting Engine V0.9.28 (by Hippiman) and DizzyAge Map Editor (by Alexandru Simion)

--------------------
Game made for ZX-Spectrum personal computer and you need an emulator program (like Spectaculator or Unreal Speccy to run it)

--------------------

Story
Dizzy and the Yolkfolk are sheltering from the winter snow and cold in their log cabin. 
Unfortunately there's no fire going, and Pogie is sitting on the wood!
Help Dizzy to keep the Yolkfolk warm and get the fire lit before they freeze to death!

---------------

Creators:

Story, puzzles: Jamie Douglas

Code:Verm-V

Graphics:
Charcacters: Jamie Douglas
Title Screen: "Wintry Lodge" by Andy Green
HUD: VK007, Verm-V
Some sprites: Hippiman, Verm-V, VK007

Music:
Menu - "Winter Vacation (2017)" by MmcM
Game - "Warm days (2018)" by MmcM

Beta testing: VK007, Titus, Hippiman

Based on characters created by Oliver Twins
